channel.title: Unoffical Help Thread
channel.description:
Hi, I'm 99 stats owns and this is the 'Unoffical help thread' here you can ask questions and get them answered. [b][u]KEEP TO THE RULES[/u][/b] If you don't know the rules here they are.
[u][b]Rule 1: NO spamming.
Rule 2: NO flaming
Rule 3: If you have asked for help there's no need to double post it.
Rule 4: Please be painent as I might be away.
Rule 5: NO swearing, there's NO need for it[/b][/u]
Well post away. :P
[u][b]ALSO: DON'T SPAM THIS THREAD ANY SPAM WILL BE REPORTED.[/b][/u]

item.title: Unoffical Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @barrows_ftw1 barrows ftw
item.description:
@barrows_ftw1 wrote:

hey, i got a ::bank problem. only admins can use ::bank and i need all players to be able to use it. please help and good luck on your thread

Read full topic
